transcript:
Customer: O dijiye sir aao.

Customer: Dijiye sir.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haanji.

Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se Ashna baat kar rahi thi, kaise hain aap?

Customer: Ji main badhiya hoon aap bataiye.

Executive: Sir actually aapka yahan se mera ek complaint aaya tha, call aaya tha kuch aapko reactivation chahiye tha.

Customer: Ji mam mujhe abhi services band karani hai.

Executive: Main jaan sakti hoon exact reason kya hai jiski wajah se aap band karana chah rahe hain sir isko?

Customer: Mam reason main batata hoon aapko mujhe one month se upar ho gaya.

Customer: Theek hai.

Customer: Services services lete hue lekin services ka abhi tak koi benefit matlab jo bhi mere paas leads aati hai sari ki sari inquiries wali aati hai.

Executive: Achcha.

Customer: Dekhte hue leads aisi nahi aayi bole ki haan mere ko chahiye ya main lunga nahi bolte ki dekhenge kisi ka number off aate kisi ke contact number hota number nahi lag pata kisi ka number lag bhi jata hai to wo bolte inquiry kar dete batayenge agar hume chahiye hogi to batayenge.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Sir ya to dusri baat hai jitni bhi leads aati hai na one se lekar 2 feet tak ki mere paas leads aati hai.

Executive: Kitni kitni?

Customer: Ek se 2 feet ya 2.5 feet tak ki 2 feet 2.5 feet.

Executive: Achcha aur aap jo business kar rahe hain ye pan India kar rahe hain ya kaise kar rahe hain sir?

Customer: India kar raha hoon mam.

Executive: Pan India business karte hain na sir?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Aur minimum order value kitni rehti hogi sir?

Customer: Samajh nahi hindi mein bataiye.

Executive: Sir ye keh rahi hoon minimum order value ka matlab hota hai ki aapko ek piece bhi chalta hai ya fir kitna matlab kitna chahte hain 20000, 40000, 50000 kitne ka ek chahiye hota hai aapko ek?

Customer: Mam mera hota hai 30 40000 se start hota hai 5 lakh tak ka.

Executive: Theek hai to 40000 ka business chalega aapko right?

Customer: Mam iska matlab ye nahi hai 40 ka chalega to aap sari lead 40 ki doge.

Executive: Sir hum nahi 40 ki denge hum ek idea le rahe hain aapse don't worry abhi aapka jo hai na account start hua hai sir isme thoda time lagta hai cheezon ko result aane mein aisa nahi hota ki sir.

Customer: Excuse me meri baat suniye mam aap aisa nahi hai ki pehli baar IndiaMART use kar raha hoon pehle bhi chala chuka hoon mere GST to nahi hai mam iska matlab ye nahi hai ki maine.

Executive: Sir aapne chalaya hai to itna to aapko bhi pata hi hoga na sir ki IndiaMART pe business kaise hota hai.

Customer: Pata hai mujhe mam mujhe pata hai ek mahine mein kam se kam do ya teen customer mil jaate the mujhe jo tijori lene wale hote the unko main deta bhi hoon.

Customer: Theek hai aur ab kya ho raha ab jab maine ye plan le liya to bol rahe kya ye plan aise nahi chalega wo chalega aapko 55000 wale lena chahiye tha to jo 55000 wale lena chahiye tha to mujhe 55000 wale pehle batate na mujhe uske bare mein bataya hi nahi.

Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir aisa kuch nahi hai.

Customer: Ab meri profile khud check kar lo.

Executive: Sir dekhiye ek cheez main aapko bataungi aisa nahi hota hai ki sir sari lead waisi aayegi aapko filterization karna padega jaise example hum 1 lakh ke upar ke lead karte hain.

Customer: Main samajh gaya hoon.

Executive: Hai na agar aapko fir bhi lag raha hai ki dekho main din ki aapki hume hafte mein 10 lead milti hai theek hai to agar aapko lag raha main ek hafte mein ek bhi buyer aisa nahi nikal pa raha ki jisse main baat kar paun to problemtic hota hai sir pehla point theek hai.

Customer: Mam aisa hi to hai.

Executive: Sir agar aisa hai main chalo maan leti hoon aapke paas.

Customer: Meri baat suniye mam hafte mein 10 leads milte hai mere ko theek hai 10 mein se ek bhi leads aisi nahi hai jo customer mujhse maal le raha ho hafte bhi to chodiye 15 din 20 din man pura ek mahina ho gaya.

Executive: Haan.

Executive: Sir aapne ek tijori purchase kari thi aaj Jaunpur ki Godrej safety locker ki inse baat hui aapki abhi?

Customer: Aapki aawaz saaf nahi aa rahi mam.

Executive: Main keh rahi hoon aapne Jaunpur se ek lead purchase kari thi aaj Jaunpur se aayi thi Godrej safety locker ki.

Customer: Main batata hoon aapko uske bare mein suniye meri baat jo mera account dekh rahe hain na aap.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Haan.

Executive: Haan haan bolo sir main sun rahi hoon.

Customer: Haan mam haan jo mera account dekh rahe hain unhone bola mujhse maine unse shikayat kari ki aise aise baat hai mere paas koi leads aisi nahi aa rahi to unhone bola leads jo ye jo main bata raha hoon aap inko uthao aur conference pe leke baat karo maine theek hai maine unko conference pe leke baat kiya aur unko pata lag unko unhone suna unhone kya bola unhone bola mujhe nahi chahiye main to inquiry kar raha tha main dekh raha tha.

Executive: Achcha to aapne ek cheez nahi boli is cheez par ki agar aap dekh rahe the to aap apne number apni email ID sab kuch de dete.

Customer: Mam main ye bhi to hota hai na sir aap bhi ek businessman ho aap bhi agar market mein kuch lene jaoge to kya apni sari cheeze deke aaoge.

Executive: Customer se is tarah se baat karenge kis tarah.

Executive: Kyun nahi kar sakte sir jab customer ki complaint aap hume bata sakte ho to hum ispe reason kya karenge aap mujhe batao sir kyun nahi puchenge sir hum is cheez ko agar customer jhooth bol raha hai to us cheez ko hum bolenge na sir.

Customer: Mam aise thodi na kisi bhi client hume kuch bhi bole to hum lenge uska.

Customer: To ek cheez aap dekhiye.

Executive: Sir hum to tab karenge na jab hume dekho sir hume aapka data assign nahi hota hai pehla point hume sirf aapka data ye dikhta hai ki aapne kis lead ko purchase kiya hai kahan se kiya that's it wo customer kaun tha kya baat hui thi.

Customer: No no sir.

Executive: Okay okay meri baat suniye aap maine haanji bataye jab se ye plan liya hai jab se ab tak kitni lead uthai hai ye to isme show kar raha hoga aapke system mein.

Executive: Haan sir ek second main dekhti hoon kar raha hai na haan ab aap ek ek ek ek baar khol ke to puchiye ki aap unhone tijori diamond safe wale se li hai ya nahi aapko pata lag jayega to aapko lagega main jhooth bol raha hoon.

Executive: Sir main kahan bol rahi hoon maine to bola hi nahi pehli cheez to abhi tak ki haan aapko business mila hai nahi nahi sir maine aisa nahi bola ki aapko business mila aur aap use nahi kar rahe pehla point to sir main ye cheez bol hi nahi rahi hoon mera concern sirf itna hai jo aap bol rahe ho na aapke client bolte hain ki hume nahi lena humne to aise hi dala tha dekhne ke liye to uska answer de rahi hoon sir ek client ho sakta hai do client ho sakte hain sare client aise nahi ho sakte hain business sir dekho IndiaMART pe jo aapne paisa lagaya hai na.

Executive: Haanji.

Customer: Ji ji ji.

Executive: Sir IndiaMART pe jo aapne paisa lagaya hai na sir aapne promotion activity aur buyer ke liye lagaya hai maturity ke liye to wo to aap mature karoge na sir hamara kaam hai ek right buyer ko aapke paas leke aana us right buyer ke sath discuss karna kya exact hai.

Customer: Aap kaise leke aaoge jo inquiry wale honge jinko tijori leni hi nahi hai to unse main kya karu mam unse jinko tijori leni hi nahi hai unse meri baatein hoti hai unse main kya karu.

Executive: Sir agar tijori nahi leni hoti to hum unke ghar thodi na gaye the unka number lene aap mujhe ye cheez bataye hum unke ghar nahi gaye the na number email ID lene GST lene.

Customer: Main nahi jaunga ye baat karne ke liye.

Executive: Haan to aap koi baat nahi sir hum aapko bas data de sakte hain sir hum aapko data de sakte hain sir.

Customer: Data de sakte hain baat karne aap mera wo refund wapas kara dijiye aapko to baat hi pata nahi kaise.

Executive: Sir aise refund nahi hota hai ki hamari man ki marzi ho to humne paisa de diya aur ab refund le le aise nahi hota sir.

Customer: Theek hai sir ye ruko.

Executive: Aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to cancel the services.

- Leads are only inquiry-based, not sales-oriented.

- Leads are of small size (1-2 feet).

- Feels misled about the appropriate subscription plan.



Resolution:

- Explained the need for filterization.

- Clarified IndiaMART's role in bringing potential buyers.

- Stated refund is not possible as per customer's wish.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, leads, subscription, business, inquiry
